title: New Client crashes on launch everytime
body: I don't know what happened but i finally got accepted into the alpha client thing, installed it then tried to run it and it bugsplats everytime i start to launch it. not sure whats going on.

replies.body: It's possible that some files were not overwritten properly, or may have become corrupt.  I'd recommend performing a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)in this case to smooth out any bad files, per the[ known issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768) guide.  Hope that helps!
i just uninstalled then reinstalled the alpha client and it still crashes on launch.
